item.title: How to Automatically Collect Heterogeneous Database Table Directories | Analysis of Patent CN111339081A
item.description: With the growth of enterprise data, managing and integrating multiple databases has become a significant challenge. Patent CN111339081A , titled “Automatic collection method and system for table directory of heterogeneous database”, offers a highly automated solution that boosts data extraction efficiency by up to 70% and reduces manual deployment and verification time by 90%.
